name: Multiplayer Test - COG
description:
Honestly, this game sucks. But it was a good learning experience.

Made for: Multiplayer Game Challenge by My friend and I

donate robux: https://www.roblox.com/games/3922676843/Line-Runner-Classic#!/store

How to Play

Controls / Objective: 

Use the arrow keys to move around, your objective is to collect coins.

How to start a server:

1. type a name into the input field next to the create button (this will be the name of your server).

2. click the create button, you will automatically join the server.

3. for your friends to join a server, they will need to type the name of the server next to the join button and click join.
